## Format Covariates
```{r}
methy <- getBeta(PD_RG_filtered)
methy <- methy[,colnames(methy) %in% colnames(genotype)]
genotype <- genotype[,colnames(genotype) %in% c(colnames(genotype)[1:6],colnames(methy)),with=FALSE]
all(colnames(genotype)[-c(1:6)] == colnames(methy))

female_meta <- female_meta[female_meta$patient %in% colnames(methy)]
male_meta <- male_meta[male_meta$patient %in% colnames(methy)]
```
```{r}
methy <- as.data.table(methy,keep.rownames = "cpg")
# Male data
fwrite(methy[,c("cpg",male_meta$patient),with=FALSE],"male_methy_2022.txt.gz",sep='\t',quote=F)
fwrite(genotype[,c("SNP",male_meta$patient),with=FALSE],"male_geno_2022.txt.gz",sep='\t',quote=F)
fwrite(male_meta[,.(PD,age,smoking,alcohol1,head_trauma, CTP_PC1,CTP_PC2,CTP_PC3,CTP_PC4,ancestryPC1,ancestryPC2,ancestryPC3,plate,SentrixPosition_A,weights)],"male_meta_2022_w_weights.txt.gz",sep='\t',quote=F)
fwrite(male_meta[,.(PD,age,smoking,alcohol1,head_trauma, CTP_PC1,CTP_PC2,CTP_PC3,CTP_PC4,ancestryPC1,ancestryPC2,ancestryPC3,plate,SentrixPosition_A)],"male_meta_2022_no_weights.txt.gz",sep='\t',quote=F)
# Female data
fwrite(methy[,c("cpg",female_meta$patient),with=FALSE],"female_methy_2022.txt.gz",sep='\t',quote=F)
fwrite(genotype[,c("SNP",female_meta$patient),with=FALSE],"female_geno_2022.txt.gz",sep='\t',quote=F)
fwrite(female_meta[,.(PD,age,smoking,alcohol1,head_trauma, CTP_PC1,CTP_PC2,CTP_PC3,CTP_PC4,ancestryPC1,ancestryPC2,ancestryPC3,plate,SentrixPosition_A,weights)],"female_meta_2022_w_weights.txt.gz",sep='\t',quote=F)
fwrite(female_meta[,.(PD,age,smoking,alcohol1,head_trauma, CTP_PC1,CTP_PC2,CTP_PC3,CTP_PC4,ancestryPC1,ancestryPC2,ancestryPC3,plate,SentrixPosition_A)],"female_meta_2022_no_weights.txt.gz",sep='\t',quote=F)
```
